title: "test" topic crashes applocation
body:
### Description

[comment]: # (Feature or Bug? i.e Type: Bug)
*Type*: Bug

[comment]: # (Describe the feature you would like, or briefly summarise the bug and what you did, what you expected to happen, and what actually happens. Sections below)
*Summary*: Application crashes after joining of public chat with "test" topic

#### Expected behavior
[comment]: # Application shouldn't crash.

#### Actual behavior
[comment]: # But it crashes.

### Reproduction
[comment]: # (Describe how we can replicate the bug step by step.)

- Open Status
- Press "join public chat"
- enter "test" topic
- press "create"

#### Logs

[comment]: # (if on Android please replicate bug whilst running adb logcat)

after
```
[
:status-im.commands.handlers.loading/add-commands
"test"
"I18n.translations = {\n en: {\n location_title: 'Location',\n location_description: 'Share your location',\n location_address: 'Address',\n\n browse_title: 'Browser',\n browse_description: 'Launch the browser',\n\n send_title: 'Send ETH',\n send_description: 'Send a payment',\n\n request_title: 'Request ETH',\n request_description: 'Request a payment',\n request_requesting: 'Requesting ',\n\n validation_title: 'Amount',\n validation_amount_specified: 'Amount must be specified',\n validation_invalid_number: 'Amount is not valid number',\n validation_insufficient_amount: 'Insufficient funds for gas * price + value (balance '\n },\n ru: {\n location_title: 'Местоположение',\n location_description: 'Поделитесь своим местоположением',\n location_address: 'Адрес',\n\n browse_title: 'Браузер',\n browse_description: 'Запуск браузера',\n\n send_title: 'Отправить ETH',\n send_description: 'Отправить платеж',\n\n request_title: 'Запросить ETH',\n request_description: 'Запросить платеж',\n request_requesting: 'Запрос ',\n\n validation_title: 'Сумма',\n vali....
```
This problem was caused by messages that weren't sent from Status and this case wasn't handled properly.
